bookingNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned to the shipment booking, used for tracking and reference. They are often referred to as 'Booking No.', 'Booking Reference', 'Our Reference', or 'Order Ref'.

contractNumber.description: It's a contract number between the carrier and Forto Logistics SE & Co KG. Shipment Id 'S' followed by 6, 7, or 8 digits e.g. S9486358 is not a contract number.

pickUpTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal for cargo pickup during the import shipment.

gateInTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal where cargo is gated in especially Export terminal delivery address. E.g., FULL RETURN TO or Export terminal name.

proformaDate.description: The date considered to apply the rates and charges specified in the booking confirmation

cyCutOff.description: The datetime by which the cargo to be delivered to the Container Yard. It can be found with keys CARGO CUT OFF DATE/TIME

gateInReference.description: A reference code for cargo entering the terminal to drop the loaded cargo for Export. Sometimes it can be 'Booking Number'.

mblNumber.description: Bill of Lading number (B/L NO.), a document issued by the carrier.

pickUpReference.description: A reference code for cargo pickup during the import shipment. Sometimes it can be 'Our Reference'.

siCutOff.description: The deadline datetime for submitting the Shipping Instructions (SI) to the carrier. It can be found with keys DOC CUT OFF DATE/TIME

vgmCutOff.description: The deadline datetime for submitting the Verified Gross Mass (VGM) to the carrier. It can be found with keys VGM DEADLINE, VGM DUE, VGM CUT OFF.

containerType.description: The size / type of the container, such as 20ft, 40ft, 40HC, 20DC etc under Type/Size column.

pickUpDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be picked up. It is identified as Empty Pick Up AT Depot or Export Empty Pick Up Depot(s).

dropOffDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be dropped off.

eta.description: Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) is the expected date when the shipment will arrive at its destination.

etd.description: Estimated Time of Departure (ETD) is the expected date when the shipment will leave the origin port.

imoNumber.description: The International Maritime Organization number for a specific leg. It can be found as IMO No, IMO number.

portOfDischarge.description: The port where the goods are discharged from the vessel. This is the destination port for the shipment. It can be found at POD, Port of Discharge, To, Discharge Port

portOfLoading.description: The port where the goods are loaded onto the vessel. This is the origin port for the shipment. It can be found at POL, Port of Loading, From, Load Port

vesselName.description: The name of the vessel carrying the shipment. It can be found at VESSEL/VOYAGE e.g., MOL EMERALD

voyage.description: The journey or route taken by the vessel for a specific leg. It can be found at VESSEL/VOYAGE e.g., 087E

carrierAddress.description: The address of the carrier who provides service and issued the document.

carrierName.description: The name of the carrier who issued the document. Extract full name. e,g, Evergreen Line.
